sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7871d8bddb49370019565d50cf961955</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>requestNewManager Msg</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var reqActionMsg='';
	if(g_form.getValue('request_new_manager')=='true'){
		reqActionMsg=g_form.getValue('requested_action');
		//alert(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New'));
		if(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New')!=-1){
			reqActionMsg=reqActionMsg.substring(0,(reqActionMsg.indexOf('New')-1));
			//alert(reqActionMsg);
		}
		var requestManagwerName='';
		g_form.getReference('new_manager',function (ref){
			reqActionMsg+='\nNew manager Requested is : '+ref.getValue('name');
			g_form.setValue('requested_action',reqActionMsg);
		});
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-05 11:52:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1936282edbfdb70019565d50cf9619c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestNewManager Msg</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1936282edbfdb70019565d50cf9619c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>RV</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-14 08:54:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
